:/ipfs/QmakRe49KgWStuw9R6pRPHoVj29gofXG72MaHDwXB29BrP"]},"project:/contracts/main/interfaces/ISystemDebtEngine.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdea42a6a4bdaa0d05cf187f1a1aa2b3b49ae5bccece43953b30342660037078e","license":"AGPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://f1ca0e9a4a82970b6e681fb0db3fc39f456c673ccb0957ec079c42c907da80ca","dweb:/ipfs/QmXuPaGUT1xgCHJjDgty8w1pRSebeZ5vJondom5BW3T9FC"]},"project:/contracts/main/stablecoin-core/ShowStopper.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd2730a94b8c1e7ed3d9d116e76de614aa4c6b44c9258b15fff196e6607d5f0d4","license":"AGPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://208d4eeb87e554385271abee4f669528f0a9e6cf1d11407350714c7abff8e963","dweb:/ipfs/Qma51E1ete1Gk5Jn7SWjU9izjdcKMgfsqX6TxVjhj1GMKU"]},"project:/contracts/main/utils/CommonMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x46538136f80d09dba3e60ba6f379e1a7032792cc92cf6ba7ca39ff9fc2a7923d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c1d9f764482a3ddb886bee974719008c86544e081cd50b7afabd94f6c4b0cc61","dweb:/ipfs/QmduYsKiFtTjeqKg36waKUrVRUcM6RysG8mqYhznJSrBXn"]}},"version":1}

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

devdoc.details: The ShowStopper contract is a system component that handles the emergency shutdown process. It allows the system owner to initiate an emergency shutdown, pause certain system functions, calculate and settle bad debt, and finalize the total debt of the system after the shutdown. It also calculates the redeemStablecoin price of each collateral pool and allows users to redeem their stablecoins for collateral tokens.

accumulateBadDebt(bytes32,address).details: The badDebtAccumulator will be used to determine the stablecoin redemption price and ensure all bad debt is covered.

params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool that the position belongs to.
params._positionAddress: The address of the position to inspect for bad debt.

accumulateStablecoin(uint256).details: The caller's stablecoin will be locked until they redeem the stablecoins for collateral tokens.

params._amount: The amount of stablecoin to accumulate.

cage(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the contract owner.

params._cageCoolDown: Length of the cooldown period for the emergency shutdown, in seconds. The cage function starts the emergency shutdown process, which includes the following steps:  - Start a cooldown period for the emergency shutdown.  - Pause BookKeeper: locking/unlocking collateral and mint/repay Fathom Stablecoin will not be allowed for any positions.  - Pause LiquidationEngine: positions will not be liquidated.  - Pause SystemDebtEngine: no accrual of new debt, no system debt settlement.  - Pause PriceOracle: no new price updates, no liquidation trigger.

cagePool(bytes32).details: This function can only be called by the contract owner after the system has been caged (emergency shutdown initiated).

params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool to set the cage price for.

finalizeCashPrice(bytes32).details: The redeemStablecoin price is the price at which Fathom Stablecoin holders can redeem their stablecoins for collateral tokens. The price takes into account the deficit/surplus of the collateral pool and ensures all bad debt is covered.

params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool to calculate the redeemStablecoin price for.

finalizeDebt().details: This function should be called after all positions have undergone `accumulateBadDebt` or `snip` to settle all debt, system surplus must be zero, and the emergency shutdown cooldown period has passed. The total debt will be equivalent to the total stablecoin issued, reflecting the correct value after the emergency shutdown.

redeemLockedCollateral(bytes32,address,a.details: The position must have no debt and should have gone through the `accumulateBadDebt` or `smip` process already.

params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool that the position belongs to.
params._collateralReceiver: The address to receive the redeemed collateral tokens.
params._positionAddress: The address of the position to redeem locked collateral from.

redeemStablecoin(bytes32,uint256).details: The stablecoin will be redeemed at the corresponding finalCashPrice of the collateral pool.

params._amount: The amount of stablecoin to redeem.
params._collateralPoolId: The ID of the collateral pool to redeem stablecoin from.

devdoc.title: ShowStopper Contract

accumulateBadDebt(bytes32,address).notice: Inspects a specified position and calculates the current badDebtAccumulator for the collateral pool it belongs to.

accumulateStablecoin(uint256).notice: Accumulates the deposited stablecoin of the caller into a stablecoinAccumulator to be redeemed into collateral tokens later.

cage(uint256).notice: Initiates the process of emergency shutdown (cage).

cagePool(bytes32).notice: Sets the cage price of a specific collateral pool using the latest price from the PriceOracle.

finalizeCashPrice(bytes32).notice: Calculates the redeemStablecoin price of a specific collateral pool.

finalizeDebt().notice: Finalizes the total debt of the system after the emergency shutdown.

redeemLockedCollateral(bytes32,address,a.notice: Redeems locked collateral from a position that has been safely settled after the emergency shutdown.

redeemStablecoin(bytes32,uint256).notice: Redeems stablecoin from the stablecoinAccumulator for collateral tokens of a specific collateral pool.
